attributes.action: give blue badges to all disabled people, regardless of age, letting young children be able to get the badge too, and all disabled parking be free
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: all disabled people should be able to get the blue badge, regardless of how old they are, and that parents should be allowed to claim the badge on thier childrens behalf, also all disabled parking should be free to blue badge holders, any non badge holders parking in the said space should be fined on the spot, even in supermarket parking areas

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
